snippet: New York’s best known white-collar criminal explores the underworld in “A User’s Guide To Hell Featuring Bernard Madoff,” by Lee Blessing.
abstract: Jason Zinoman reviews Project Y Theater Company production of Lee Blessing play A User's Guide to Hell Featuring Bernard Madoff, directed by Michole Biancosino and starring Edward James Hyland at Atlantic Stage 2.
lead_paragraph: New York’s best known white-collar criminal explores the underworld in “A User’s Guide To Hell Featuring Bernard Madoff,” by Lee Blessing.

headline.seo: ‘User’s Guide To Hell Featuring Bernard Madoff’ by Project Y
headline.main: Notes From Underground, Where Financiers Sizzle
headline.print_headline: Notes From Underground, Where Financiers Sizzle
headline.kicker: Theater Review | 'A User’s Guide To Hell Featuring Bernard Madoff'
